name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **ReactJS**, **NodeJS**, and **NestJS**, with demonstrated expertise in developing **RESTful APIs** and managing **PostgreSQL** databases. Adept in **Agile methodologies**, utilizing **Git**, and implementing **CI/CD** processes and **DevOps practices** to streamline development workflows.
Skilled in both frontend and backend technologies, including **Koa.js**, delivering robust solutions with a focus on scalability and performance. Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, ensuring high availability and reliability.
Possesses strong problem-solving and communication skills, enhanced by a commitment to compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards. Additionally, brings hands-on experience in integrating **AI/ML** solutions to support advanced predictive analytics and real-time processing.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed high-performing full-stack applications leveraging **TypeScript**, **ReactJS**, **Node.js**, and **RESTful API** to deliver scalable solutions that meet business requirements.
• Successfully implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Git**, **DevOps practices**, and cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure** for automated builds and deployments, achieving a deployment frequency of over **10** times per week.
• Spearheaded the use of modern frameworks, enhancing productivity by **30%** through Agile methodologies and continuous integration strategies.
• Engineered data solutions with **PostgreSQL** and other database technologies, ensuring data integrity and high availability for applications supporting a user base of over **50,000**.
• Employed **Koa.js** for building APIs that improved response times by **20%**, streamlining interactions between front-end and back-end services.
• Championed cross-functional team collaboration, enhancing communication and problem-solving capabilities that led to the successful delivery of multiple features within tight deadlines.
• Utilized advanced data visualization tools like **AG Grid** and **Apache Echarts**, driving insights and enabling real-time analytics for user activities and performance metrics.
• Identified and resolved complex software issues, mitigating risks and ensuring seamless user experiences for applications deployed in production.
• Drove enhancements in application architecture by applying design patterns that supported scalability and maintainability across various projects.
• Mentored junior engineers, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing that increased team productivity.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **ReactJS (18)** to build interactive front-end applications, integrating **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive financial tools and admin panels.
Developed microservices architecture for core financial platforms using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, improving scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Implemented RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between front-end and back-end services, ensuring robust data handling and user experience.
Designed and delivered real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to access insights into transactions with reduced latency.
Established an event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to enhance asynchronous communication across workflows, streamlining payments and compliance processes.
Created ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time processing, managing **9 TB** of data monthly.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, improving suspicious activity detection based on user behavior with a **95% accuracy** rate.
Engineered ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services, enhancing operational efficiency.
Adhered to **Agile methodologies**, ensuring effective communication and collaboration within the development team to deliver projects on time and within scope.
Managed source control and CI/CD processes using **Git** and **DevOps practices** to maintain high deployment frequency and software quality.

Utilized **TypeScript** to develop robust and maintainable codebases for full stack applications, ensuring adherence to Agile methodologies and fostering collaboration within teams.
Designed and implemented scalable **RESTful APIs** using **Node.js** (specifically **NestJS** and **Koa.js**) for seamless integration with various services and a high-quality user experience.
Engineered frontend solutions using **ReactJS** to create dynamic and responsive interfaces, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.
Managed database systems utilizing **PostgreSQL**, ensuring efficient data retrieval processes and maintaining data integrity across applications.
Applied **Git** for version control, fostering a collaborative environment and maintaining a streamlined workflow in the development process.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes, leveraging **DevOps practices** to ensure smooth integration and delivery.
Collaborated within **Agile** frameworks, enhancing team dynamics and achieving project milestones effectively.
Migrated legacy systems to cloud environments using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** to improve scalability and maintainability, optimizing application performance.
Executed data visualization tasks utilizing **AG Grid** and **Apache Echarts** to create interactive dashboards that enhanced data analysis abilities for stakeholders.
Executed efficient problem-solving strategies to troubleshoot complex issues, resulting in a 30% reduction in downtime and improved application reliability.
Enhanced product delivery speed by implementing Agile workflows, achieving a 25% faster release cycle within the development team.
Maintained clear communication channels with stakeholders to gather requirements, providing regular updates on project progress and ensuring alignment with business goals.
